sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post">
    <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <category display_value="Note">83f60c3e1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbaa</category>
        <github_id>30</github_id>
        <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/30</github_url>
        <message>gs.getProperty is faster than an equivalent gliderecord. 

var stopwatch1 = new GlideStopWatch();
gs.print(gs.getProperty('<replace name>'));
gs.print('Timer:'+stopwatch1);

var stopwatch2 = new GlideStopWatch();
var gr1 = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
gr1.addEncodedQuery('name=<replace name>');
gr1.setLimit(1);
gr1.query();
if (gr1.next()) {
gs.print(gr1.getValue('value'));
}
gs.print('Timer:'+stopwatch2);</message>
        <number>TIL0001023</number>
        <status>old</status>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-05-16 15:57:03</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9515d7bd1b3894108ed631d7dc4bcb23</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on>
        <title>gs.getProperty is faster</title>
    </x_0586_til_post>
</record_update>
